name: doorknob licking tournament 2008
description:
This is a crappy little joke game I made in 2019 to get a basic understanding of how RPG Maker worked. Then fast forward several years later and I've made sequels and updated the original countless times. God help me. Enjoy my nonsensical prototypical scribblings in videogame form, if you dare...

Also be warned, this game has some swears in it. Don't let your kids watch it!!!
